meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brian Lambert Renie Sotiropoulos Jeffrey Burcaw Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4430.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Brian Lambert, a student from Lancaster, Pennsylvania
Renie Sotiropoulos, a high school teacher from Crownsville, Maryland
Jeffrey Burcaw, a vice president of an engineering firm from Warner Robins, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,399)
